title: With the que down now If I leave do I get punished (stuck in que load screen cant get off)
body:
I just join a champ select (in norms) and during ban phase the client just stopped. If I leave do I get punished?

UPDATE: I ended up having to leave

replies.body: Sorry to hear about this leave.  :/  It sounds like you might have lost sync and were left behind.  As a first step, I recommend enabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode in case the aesthetics during champion select is causing too much stress and freezing.  Otherwise, this can be caused by a degrading connection so going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I got the same thing, and I was in ranked. Client froze on me, and I gave it close to 5 mins to reconnect and nothing happened so I left. I hope this won't cost me LP and a wait, but it seems like both SR queues and ARAM are down. What gives?
